mapper.select: select d.stu_no, b.SUB_CD, b.sub_nm, b.isu, b.credit, c.prof_nm from ATTEND_TB a, SUBJECT_TB b, PROFESSOR_TB c, student_tb d where a.stu_no = d.stu_no and b.prof_cd = c.prof_cd and a.sub_cd = b.sub_cd and b.years=(select date_format(now(), "%Y") as years) and b.sem = d.stu_sem and a.stu_no=#{stu_no} group by sub_cd
mapper.delete: delete from ATTEND_TB where stu_no = #{stu_no} and sub_cd = #{sub_cd};
